fs.fibu2.print
Class PrintHelper

java.lang.Object
  fs.fibu2.print.PrintHelper

public class PrintHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides some static methods which simplify painting in a graphics context

Author:
Simon Hampe

Method Detail

printString

public static void printString(java.awt.Graphics g,
                               java.lang.String s,
                               java.awt.Rectangle r,
                               java.awt.Color c,
                               PrintHelper.XAlign xalign,
                               PrintHelper.YALign yalign,
                               boolean scale)
Prints a string and scales it to fit the given parameters

Parameters:
g - The graphics context to draw on. Changes to the context will not be reversed at the end (such as e.g. color)
s - The string to print
r - The rectangle in which the string should be drawn
c - The color in which the string should be drawn
xalign - Where the string should be drawn horizontally within the rectangle
yalign - Where the string should be drawn vertically within the rectangle
scale - Whether the font size should be changed. If false is selected, the given font in the graphics context is used. If true is chosen, the font size is adapted, such that the String is as large as possible while still fitting within the rectangle

maximalFontSize

public static float maximalFontSize(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                    java.lang.String s,
                                    java.awt.Rectangle r)
Calculates the maximal font size for a given string to fit into a given rectangle

Parameters:
g - The graphics context for which this is calculated
s - The string which should be printed
r - the rectangle in which the string should fit
Returns:
The maximal font size (> 0), which is gradually decreased by 1
